titleStmt.title: A letter to Sir Thomas Osborn, one of His Majesties Privy Council upon the reading of a book called The present interest of England stated.
titleStmt.author: Buckingham, George Villiers, Duke of, 1628-1687.

notesStmt.note: Written by the Duke of Buckingham. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
